H0.text: Metal can be used to conduct electricity in a circuit.

H1.text: Wood can be used to conduct electricity in a circuit.

H2.text: Rubber can be used to conduct electricity in a circuit.

H3.text: Plastic can be used to conduct electricity in a circuit.

A4.text: Materials made of metal are common electrical conductors.

A5.text: Typical organic compounds do not conduct because they lack charge carriers.
